import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carousel', templateUrl: './carousel.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carousel.component.css'] }) export class CarouselComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { slides = [ { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555041469-a586c61ea9bc?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1770&q=80', title: 'Furniture Makes Happy Home', subtitle: 'Your home should tell the story of who you are.', link: '/items/sofa', buttonText: 'Discover More' }, { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1586023492125-27b2c045efd7?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1770&q=80', title: 'Premium Comfort', subtitle: 'Experience luxury and comfort with our exclusive sofa collections.', link: '/items/sofa', buttonText: 'Shop Sofas' }, { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1616594039964-ae9021a400a0?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1770&q=80', title: 'Bedroom Sanctuary', subtitle: 'Transform your bedroom into a peaceful retreat.', link: '/items/bed', buttonText: 'Explore Beds' } ]; currentSlide = 0; private intervalId: any; ngOnInit() { this.startAutoSlide(); } ngOnDestroy() { this.stopAutoSlide(); } startAutoSlide() { this.intervalId = setInterval(() => { this.nextSlide(); }, 3000); // Change slide every 3 seconds } stopAutoSlide() { if (this.intervalId) { clearInterval(this.intervalId); } } nextSlide() { this.currentSlide = (this.currentSlide + 1) % this.slides.length; } prevSlide() { this.currentSlide = (this.currentSlide - 1 + this.slides.length) % this.slides.length; } goToSlide(index: number) { this.currentSlide = index; this.resetAutoSlide(); } resetAutoSlide() { this.stopAutoSlide(); this.startAutoSlide(); } }
